metadata.title: CVE-2024-0745 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The WebAudio `OscillatorNode` object was susceptible to a stack bufferoverflow. This could have led to a potentially exploitable crash. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 122.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
